name: october-project-spend
text: total spend in October 2025 broken down by project
query:
SELECT 
  project.id AS project_id,
  project.name AS project_name,
  SUM(cost) AS total_spend
FROM `chip_billing.gcp_billing_export_resource_v1_01D01E_9B88C7_8078BC`
WHERE DATE(usage_start_time) BETWEEN '2025-10-01' AND '2025-10-31'
GROUP BY project.id, project.name
ORDER BY total_spend DESC

meta.sql_flow_diagram:
flowchart TD
    Q["Question: Total spend in October 2025 broken down by project"]
    T1[("gcp_billing_export_resource_v1_01D01E_9B88C7_8078BC")]
    F1{"Filter: DATE(usage_start_time) BETWEEN '2025-10-01' AND '2025-10-31'"}
    G1{"Group By: project.id, project.name"}
    AGG{"SUM(cost) AS total_spend"}
    S1{"Order By: total_spend DESC"}
    R["Result: Project ID, Project Name, Total Spend for October 2025"]

    Q --> T1
    T1 --> F1
    F1 --> G1
    G1 --> AGG
    AGG --> S1
    S1 --> R
